timeZone.description: The identifier of the restaurant's time zone from the Olson database (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tz_database) (optional; default time zone of the server if missing)

defaultMessageBrokerEndpoint.description: The default message broker endpoint which feeds orders to all restaurants. (optional; if missing then either a restaurant-bound messageBrokerEndpoint or - if missing too - Prorozvoz.properties set up the message broker endpoint)

baseUrl.description: The message broker's base URL ala http://<host>:8161/api for the REST API of ActiveMQ. (mandatory)

username.description: The username for accessing ActiveMQ's REST API at the given base URL. (mandatory)

password.description: The password for accessing ActiveMQ's REST API at the given base URL. (mandatory)

defaultProrozvozEndpoint.description: The default Prorozvoz endpoint for receiving orders etc. from this integrator for all restaurants. (optional; if missing then either a restaurant-bound ProrozvozEndpoint or - if missing too - Prorozvoz.properties set up the Prorozvoz endpoint)

active.description: A flag for temporary deactivation of this restaurant mapping. (optional; true if missing)

restaurantId.description: Web Ordering's internal restaurant identifier which this configuration is bound to. (optional, here for backward compatibility only, will be removed in future versions)

restaurantMpk.description: Web Ordering's internal restaurant MPK which this configuration is bound to. (mandatory, still works with restaurantId if not given yet)

timeZone.description: The identifier of the restaurant's time zone from the Olson database (see https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tz_database) (optional; default time zone of the server if missing)

messageBrokerEndpoint.description: Message broker endpoint for reading order message

baseUrl.description: The message broker's base URL ala http://<host>:8161/api for the REST API of ActiveMQ. (mandatory)

username.description: The username for accessing ActiveMQ's REST API at the given base URL. (mandatory)

password.description: The password for accessing ActiveMQ's REST API at the given base URL. (mandatory)

prorozvozEndpoint.description: The default Prorozvoz endpoint for receiving orders etc. from this integrator for all restaurants. (optional; if missing then either a restaurant-bound ProrozvozEndpoint or - if missing too - Prorozvoz.properties set up the Prorozvoz endpoint)
